title: About CUCOL
text:
Our Mission
The Cambridge University Colombian Society (CUCOL) serves as a bridge between Colombian culture and the academic excellence of Cambridge University. We are dedicated to:

Preserving and sharing Colombian culture through events, celebrations, and educational activities
Supporting Colombian students in their academic and personal journey at Cambridge
Building connections between current students, alumni, and the broader Colombian community
Promoting cultural exchange and understanding within the diverse Cambridge community

title: About CUCOL
text:
Our History
Founded by passionate Colombian students who recognized the need for a cultural home away from home, CUCOL has grown into one of Cambridge’s most vibrant cultural societies. Our journey began with a small group of students sharing arepas and stories, and has evolved into a comprehensive support network that spans undergraduate, graduate, and alumni communities.

title: About CUCOL
text:
What Makes Us Special


Cultural Authenticity
We pride ourselves on maintaining authentic Colombian traditions while adapting to the Cambridge environment. From traditional vallenato music sessions to contemporary Colombian art exhibitions, we celebrate all aspects of our rich cultural heritage.


Academic Excellence
Our members consistently demonstrate the Colombian commitment to education and excellence. We support each other through study groups, mentorship programs, and academic networking events.




Inclusive Community
While rooted in Colombian culture, CUCOL welcomes anyone interested in learning about Colombia, whether they have Colombian heritage or simply appreciate our culture and values.


Global Network
Our alumni network spans continents and industries, providing current members with invaluable connections and opportunities for their future careers.

title: About CUCOL
text:
Leadership Team
Our society is led by a dedicated team of students committed to serving the Colombian community at Cambridge:

President: Leading overall strategy and external relations
Vice President: Supporting operations and member engagement
Treasurer: Managing finances and sponsorship relationships
Social Secretary: Organizing events and cultural activities
Academic Officer: Coordinating study support and academic events
Communications Officer: Managing our digital presence and outreach

Meet Our Current Committee

title: Contact CUCOL
text:
Frequently Asked Questions



How can I join CUCOL?
Simply attend one of our events or contact us through any of the channels above. We welcome everyone interested in Colombian culture!


Do I need to be Colombian to join?
No! While many of our members are Colombian or have Colombian heritage, we welcome anyone interested in Colombian culture and community.




How much does membership cost?
Student membership is £5 per academic year. Alumni can join for free, and professionals pay £10 per year.


When do you meet?
We hold regular events throughout the academic year. Check our News & Events page for upcoming activities.




Can I volunteer or help organize events?
Absolutely! We’re always looking for volunteers and committee members. Contact us to learn about opportunities.

title: Members
text:
Join Our Community
Interested in becoming part of CUCOL? We welcome all Cambridge University students, staff, and alumni who are passionate about Colombian culture and community.

Membership Benefits

Access to exclusive cultural events and celebrations
Academic support and study groups
Professional networking opportunities
Leadership development through committee roles
Connection with Colombian alumni worldwide

Become a Member


Questions?
Email us at membership@cucol.cam.ac.uk or attend one of our weekly coffee sessions every Friday at 4 PM in the MCR.

title: Welcome to CUCOL - Cambridge University Colombian Society
text:
We’re excited to launch our new website for the Cambridge University Colombian Society (CUCOL). This platform will serve as a central hub for our community, connecting Colombian students, alumni, and friends at the University of Cambridge.


Our new website features:

Modern Design: Beautiful Colombian-themed design with responsive layout
Easy Navigation: Clear sections for About, Members, News, and Contact
Mobile-Friendly: Optimized for all devices and screen sizes
Regular Updates: News and events section for community updates




Whether you’re a current student, alumni, or simply interested in Colombian culture, we welcome you to be part of our vibrant community. Stay connected with us through our social media channels and upcoming events.
¡Bienvenidos a CUCOL!

title: Welcome to CUCOL
text:
Connecting Colombian culture with Cambridge excellence since our founding. Join our vibrant community of students, alumni, and friends celebrating Colombian heritage at one of the world’s most prestigious universities.



Join Our Community Learn More

title: Welcome to CUCOL
text:
What We Offer



Cultural Events
Experience authentic Colombian culture through our festivals, food events, and traditional celebrations that bring the warmth of Colombia to Cambridge.




Academic Support
Connect with fellow Colombian students and alumni for academic guidance, career advice, and networking opportunities across all disciplines.




Community Building
Build lasting friendships and professional relationships within our tight-knit community of Colombian students and supporters.

title: Welcome to CUCOL
text:
Recent Highlights


Independence Day Celebration 2024
Our annual Colombian Independence Day celebration brought together over 100 members for an evening of traditional music, dance, and authentic Colombian cuisine.


Academic Excellence Awards
Congratulations to our members who received recognition for outstanding academic achievements this term, representing Colombian excellence at Cambridge.


View All News
